title: Bug 4971 - Strange 'copy package'
description: When performing a 'copy package' operation in project Ae, the 'copy package' dialog incorrectly displays '2031. org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui' instead of 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui'.
OB: When selecting the 'copy package' option from the context menu of a package in project Ae, the 'copy package' dialog shows '2031. org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui' instead of 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui'.
EB: The 'copy package' dialog should display 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui' instead of '2031. org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui'.
SR:
To reproduce this issue:
1. Create a new project named xxx2.
2. Open the package viewer in project Ae.
3. Select a package.
4. From the context menu, choose the 'copy' option.
